00004 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(parse_string, 0){
00005   dfsch_strbuf_t* string;
00006   dfsch_object_t* params;
00007   DFSCH_BUFFER_ARG(args, string);
00008   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, params);
00009 
00010   return dfsch_sxml_parse_strbuf(string, 
00011                                      dfsch_sxml_parser_params(params));
00012 }

00018 
00019   return dfsch_sxml_parse_file(filename,

00033 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(emit_string, 0){
00034   dfsch_object_t* params;
00035   dfsch_object_t* infoset;
00036   dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* p;
00037   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, infoset);
00038   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, params);
00039   p = dfsch_sxml_emitter_params(params);
00040 
00041   return dfsch_make_string_cstr(dfsch_sxml_emit_cstr(infoset, p));
00042 }
00043 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(emit_file, 0){

00070 void dfsch_module_sxml_register(dfsch_object_t* env){
00071   dfsch_provide(env, "sxml");
00072   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "sxml:parse-string", 
00073                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_string));
00074   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "sxml:parse-file", 
00075                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_file));
00076   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "sxml:parse-port", 
00077                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_port));

00079                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(emit_string));
00080   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "sxml:emit-file", 
00081                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(emit_file));

00083                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(emit_port));
00084 }
